charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1101_0100_:
While walking along the beach and admiring
the sights, [Name:PlayerNickname ] paused...
Was that a moving island?!
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1101_0200_:
Intrigued by the phenomenon, 
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] moved closer...
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1101_0300_:
and found Lorelei and Lapras 
standing on the beach.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_0400_:
Oh, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I didn’t expect to see you here.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_0500_:
Lapras and I were just taking a joyride on
the ocean.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0401_0700_:
It is. Pasio has beautiful oceans around it.
Just floating on the ocean is very pleasant.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0402_0900_: Not at all. Lapras is very comfortable to ride on.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0402_1000_:
Not only that—Pasio’s waters are so calm,
I can’t imagine getting sick at all.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_1100_:
And in case you were wondering, Lapras like to
swim with people riding on their backs.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_1200_:
I don’t want you thinking that I’m forcing her
to carry me around.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0401_1400_:
I guess that was unnecessary. You seem to
understand what’s important as a Trainer.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0302_1500_: Oh, really? I didn’t know that!
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0402_1600_:
Oh, stop joking. I know you’re the kind 
of Trainer who always thinks about 
your Pokémon first and foremost.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_0402_1700_: I can tell just by looking at you.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_1800_:
I sometimes come across people who take it 
for granted that Pokémon stay with them.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_1900_:
They take it for granted that Pokémon battle—
that they listen to humans.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2000_:
But the truth is that these Pokémon stay 
with us because they trust us, 
and those people have forgotten that.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2100_:
Our Pokémon are our friends, and our friends
are our equals.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2600_: It’s great to enjoy being with your Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2700_:
But I want more people to think about whether a
Pokémon enjoys being with them the same way.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2800_:
All in all, I think it’s kindhearted Trainers like
you who are going to rise to the top of the PML.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_2900_:
At least, I hope that’s the case! That being said,
I have every intention of winning myself.
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_3000_:
Hm? You want to go for another swim, Lapras?
Really, what am I going to do with you...
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_3100_:
Well, last time I was the one who suggested
we go out...
charaepi_ch0005_00_kanna/2301_1201_3200_:
I suppose it’s only fair that we go out again if
that’s what Lapras wants.
